testcase.name: shouldNotMakeHiraganaWithNonHiraganaCharacters

failure.message: Expected: "Please use a hiragana character" but: was "Illegal character range near index 5\r\n[ã��-ã‚“ã‚”ã‚›]\r\n ^"
